Guzman et al., 2023: (Elle), 2005, <span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name">Vancouver</span> Is</span>land</span>; (Gehrels), 2013, <span class="hl-place-name">Abbotsford</span>, <span class="hl-place-name">Tsawwassen</span>. NBSCBC Bee Atlas Database: (Young), 2022, <span class="hl-place-name">Squamish</span>. iNaturalist: <span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name">Vancouver</span> Is</span>land</span>, <span class="hl-place-name">Lower Mainland</span>, <span class="hl-place-name">Fraser Valley</span>, from 2017.
